newsitem.title: USA: Investor cuts stake in Hughes Supply.
newsitem.headline: Investor cuts stake in Hughes Supply.

text.p: Investor Ray Sparks said Wednesday he cut his stake in Hughes Supply Inc to 280,161 common shares or 2.88 percent of the outstanding.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, Sparks said he sold 210,000 common shares between August 23 and August 26 at prices ranging from $38 to $40.25 per share.
